/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Trees dot the landscape, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Cars are parked along the side of the road, indicating a busy day in the city. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting light and shadows that add depth to the image.
